column5: Small cozy studio with full sized pull out bed, queen mattress, and queen sized air mattress. Right in the heart of Montrose, within walking distance of many restaurants, bars, and grocery stores.   Less than 5 miles from the NRG Stadium, 2 miles from downtown, and 3 miles from the Medical Center, Rice, and the Museum District!  Kitchen stocked with pots, pans, rice cooker, George foreman, blender and more.  Central heat and AC.
